content: this pattern makes 1 reversible mood octopus you can pretty much use any yarn and corresponding hook size you want but with the yarn i used you will need about 80 meters which is about 2 balls of yarn i hope you like this pattern if you want to use this pattern for anything go ahead i am not okay with people selling the finished toys unless it is to raise money for charity it really means a lot to me that so many people like this pattern
